name: Looping the Void: A Mandala study in blues
description: A Mandala is one's imaginary palace for contemplating the universe. Each object represents an aspect of wisdom or a principle.  Slow the mind, watch it turn, disappear then return. This Mandala is a high speed rotation of mostly blueish simple objects. The void is such a tease.The artwork is part of a series that is intended to explore what is possible when constrained to extremely simple shapes and colours. Can they lead to transcendence?
